Text:
If this is the same release I downloaded yesterday then the serial code for the Plus Pack is missing -

so here all of you are - 
C4SWH3KJ-A7K6XR7T-CDW9JYW8-39GJ79B2-KVW2SADX-7L693VXD-NH7DF9EN-HREK3MEG
I noticed you uploaded both the Plus Pack and Main Program for v6857 [but not AddOns]. Will these work with the AddOns pack v6696?

It actually Does but it Doesn't. Example - If you create Recovery Media and boot into Full mode it is the correct version. If you boot into Safe Mode it boots into the previous version - 6696.

Each ADD-ON package is updated as well so yes it functions but could make problems you will not see coming. Be warned. lol

@TheEmpathicEar

I don't know when Acronis leak the new Addons.
I understand now. Thx for being patient! And, thx for the great up!
